actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 1340 of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purposes of requiring congressional approval of any determination by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to operate the flood insurance program under part B of chapter II of such act.

summary.text: Amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to require Congressional approval of any determination by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to operate the flood insurance program under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1340 of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purposes of requiring congressional approval of any determination by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to operate the flood insurance program under part B of chapter II of such act.
